certifications.title: Intoduction to Electronics-Georgia Institute Of Technology

projects.name: Rice Grain Analysis Using Open CV in Python
projects.description: Developed a rice grain analysis project using OpenCV in Python to automate quality assessment. Utilized OpenCV functions for image processing, including segmentation and feature extraction, to analyze images of rice grains.

projects.name: Animal Detection Using Open CV In Image Processing
projects.description: Developed an animal detection project using OpenCV in image processing to automatically identify and locate animals in images. Implemented OpenCV's object detection algorithms to detect and outline animals based on features such as shape and color.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website Using Angular(FrontEnd)
projects.description: Developed an eCommerce website using Angular, a modern front-end framework. The project leverages Angular's robust features for creating a dynamic and responsive user interface, enhancing the overall user experience.

experiences.description: Participated in cross-training initiatives, gaining exposure to different facets of the manufacturing process, from assembly to quality control. Played a key role in quality control by implementing rigorous testing protocols, reducing defect rates by 12% and ensuring adherence to industry standards.

Conducted comprehensive testing and validation of electronic kits, focusing on the functional performance of components such as FG boards and MOSFETs. Developed and executed test protocols to ensure the reliability and accuracy of kits, contributing to a 98% reduction in defects and enhancing overall product quality.

full_output.name: SURTHI B
achievements_and_awards: Aerothon 2023 - Participated in Phase1 held at Global Academy Of Technology,Bengaluru
